Name: Gdj
Title: Vikram kirti mandir
Review: Well maintained small museum.established by govt of mp.varrious types of ancient murties there.nice place to visit.

Name: Gdj
Title: Vikram kirti mandir
Review: Located on kothi road maintained by government of mp. A lot of cultural and social activities organised there.shown information about king vikramadiya.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: Small museum but good ambiance
Review: Its a very small museum located at vikram kirti mandir ( its a govt auditorium where lots of cultural events and activities has been organized ) there are heritage stones and historic monuments are placed inside the museum.

Name: rathod2017
Title: Vikram Kirti Mandir Museum
Review: Built in commemoration of the beloved king Vikramaditya. you have to pay to visit this place. well maintained place and nice collection of things.

Name: Dipen Shah
Title: Nice Creation of temple cum monument
Review: Worth to visit when u are visiting ujjain.Just close to main jyotirling temple. Nice creature of king vikramaditya and 32 putli

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: One more museum
Review: museum is maintained by the government having nice collection of carvings collected from various excavated sites.

Name: vishalsomvanshi
Title: Museum moved to Triveni Museum.
Review: The place belongs to Vikram University and we were told that most of the artifacts have been moved to Triveni Museum. So if you are looking to visit the museum, please go to Triveni museum which will definitely positively surprise you.

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Historical
Review: I went to Vikram Kirti Mandir Museum. Built in 1965, this museum houses everything right from ancient manuscripts and coins to copper plates and fossils discovered in the Narmada Valley. You can pay your respects at the Vikram Kirti Mandir where the museum is situated. It is great place to go.

Name: Maneesh12345
Title: Small meusem in old temple
Review: This meusem is situated in vikramaditya temple. here they keep doing competition from time to time for children

Name: RamGanesan
Title: Not a great place
Review: This place has tons of things to see of Vikramaditya dynasty and local culture but could have been maintained better.  Place can be skipped if one does not find time in Ujjain

Name: Manish B
Title: Good Place
Review: Vikram Kirti Mandir Museum was established in the year of 1965. The place is hosting artifacts found at the Narmada valley. Excellent place to visit. But the place needs maintenance and improvements.

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: Excellent Place with some require maintain
Review: Great museum with the story of history. But there is need of maintain of museum. Must be visit by everyone.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Excellent museum but badly maintained.
Review: It was established in 1965 on the occasion of the second millennium of the Vikram era. The archaeological museum here exhibits a variety of pottery, copper utensils and fossils that have been discovered from Narmada valley. The Vishnu gallery has the finest collection of Vishnu sculptures in the country. The museum also has an impressive collection of sculptures from the Parmar and Partihar period.

Name: Avdhesh K
Title: Niclely located Museum
Review: Great leader vikram aditya's stuff are all here, place for history lovers, thrill seekers and it is very nicely located, must visit in ujjain, this is the real place there is another place too with Vikram aditya statue.

Name: Apoorv Joshi
Title: can be better
Review: vikram kirti mandir museum tells about the history of the ujjain.it is good museum but goverment need to maintain this place.

Name: npn2000
Title: Vikram Kirti Mandir Museum
Review: Vikram Kirti Mandir Museum ujjain is on dewas raod and is place for cultural activity and well known place

Name: rahulkumar1411
Title: vikram kirti museum
Review: this museum talk about the history of ujjain.its has many evidence of mauryan dynasty.like coins,utensils n all.if you are history lover then you would love this place

Name: VivekRastogi
Title: Not Great like other museum
Review: Vikram Kirti Mandir Museum is not great like other museum of India, where we can find our culture and Historical evidences. Govt. should keep it clean and should have more information about available articles.

Name: Rebekka N
Title: Disgrace
Review: We had a hard time finding this museum and its not hard to understand why..............it's in damp building ,overgrown with mildew and surrounded by weeds. The collection of stone sculptures have not seen the hands of a curator. It contents are honot remarkable as compared to the state museum at Bhopal.
